alert.note: Alert for Bath; Montgomery; Rowan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 10:40PM EST until January 16 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches. * WHERE...Montgomery, Bath and Rowan Counties. * WHEN...Until noon EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Two rounds of snow are expected. The first round will move through the area tonight, before tapering off early Monday morning, with generally up to 1 inch of snowfall expected. The second round of snow arrives Monday afternoon and will continue through early Tuesday morning, producing up to 1 inch of snowfall.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Kentucky can be found by visiting https://goky.ky.gov.
